"E:\Program\clion\CLion 2025.3.2\bin\cmake\win\x64\bin\cmake.exe" -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release "-DCMAKE_MAKE_PROGRAM=E:/Program/clion/CLion 2025.3.2/bin/ninja/win/x64/ninja.exe" -G Ninja -S C:\raylib\raylib -B C:\raylib\raylib\cmake-build-release
CMake Deprecation Warning at CMakeLists.txt:1 (cmake_minimum_required):
  Compatibility with CMake < 3.10 will be removed from a future version of
  CMake.

  Update the VERSION argument <min> value.  Or, use the <min>...<max> syntax
  to tell CMake that the project requires at least <min> but has been updated
  to work with policies introduced by <max> or earlier.
